string.value: #b#p2081003##k says he has an urgent request...
#b#p2081003##k mentioned the legendary ice bird, Frostprey, and asked me to go beneath the ice valley in El Nath. \n\n#i4001114##t4001114# #b#c4001114#/1#k
#b#p2081003##k said he will find out how to hatch the eggs...
A legendary ice bird...The Frostprey ...When did he come into this world?

I heard that a nest was found in the ice valley of El Nath. I'm not sure if this is true or not, however, if it's under the ice valley, it would be hard to fly even if it hatches. Would you like to investigate this, and if it's true, bring me the egg?

I don't know who you are but can you find #b#t4001114##k for me? Huh? What's a Frostprey? Gosh! You don't know about the Frostprey? That's the legendary ice bird. No, not the mayor of New Leaf City! You don't know? It's referred to as the star of the frozen western sky in older books. Some Say it is an eternal bird who never dies. It has wings of everlasting ice! Now the real question is, where could such a bird reside?
Really? You're so nice. Hurry up, please! The nest of Frostprey is most likely near a #bdangerous cliff#k!
What? You can't get it? Why?
Wow! You got #t4001114#! So cold! There's definitely something in here!
I have to find the best place to hatch this egg. It should be an open place, so it can fly...I'll need a few moments to think about this...
Haven't you got #b#t04001114##k? Hurry up! Go to the Dangerous Cliff.
